description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一家主要从事输电、供电业务的特大型中央企业，是全球最大的公用事业企业。
description.en: A super-large central state-owned enterprise in the People's Republic of China primarily engaged in electricity transmission and supply, and is the world's largest public utility company.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司董事长。
description.en: Chairman of State Grid Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司总经理。
description.en: General Manager of State Grid Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司的前身机构，于2002年被拆分重组。
description.en: The predecessor of State Grid Corporation of China, which was broken up and restructured in 2002.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设机构，代表国家履行出资人职责，监管中央所属经营性国有资产。
description.en: A special commission under the State Council of the People's Republic of China that acts as the investor for the state and supervises centrally-owned state-owned enterprises.

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国中央人民政府（国务院）或其委托的国有资产监督管理机构行使出资人职责的国有企业。
description.en: State-owned enterprises for which the Central People's Government (State Council) of the People's Republic of China or its authorized state-owned assets supervision and administration commission performs the duties of the investor.

description.zh-cn: 一种公司法律形式，指国家单独出资、由国务院或者地方人民政府授权本级人民政府国有资产监督管理机构履行出资人职责的有限责任公司。
description.en: A corporate legal form referring to a limited liability company solely funded by the state, where the State Council or a local people's government authorizes the state-owned assets supervision and administration commission at the same level to perform the duties of the investor.

nodes.id: 国网新源控股有限公司

zh-cn: 国网新源控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司的子公司，主要负责开发、建设、经营抽水蓄能电站和常规水电站。
description.en: A subsidiary of State Grid Corporation of China, primarily responsible for the development, construction, and operation of pumped-storage power stations and conventional hydropower stations.

description.zh-cn: 中国特大型清洁能源集团，持有国网新源控股有限公司30%的股份。
description.en: A Chinese super-large clean energy group that holds a 30% stake in Guowang Xinyuan Holdings Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国能源基础设施公司，将其智利资产Chilquinta Energia出售给了国家电网公司。
description.en: An American energy infrastructure company that sold its Chilean asset, Chilquinta Energia, to State Grid Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 智利第三大输电公司，于2019年被国家电网公司全资收购。
description.en: The third-largest electricity transmission company in Chile, fully acquired by State Grid Corporation of China in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 巴西电力巨头，国家电网公司于2017年收购其54.64%的股权，成为其控股股东。
description.en: A major Brazilian power company, of which State Grid Corporation of China acquired a 54.64% stake in 2017, becoming its controlling shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 意大利一家国有投资银行，于2014年向国家电网公司出售其旗下能源网公司35%股权。
description.en: An Italian state-owned investment bank that sold a 35% stake in its subsidiary energy grid company to State Grid Corporation of China in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网于2013年收购了其在澳大利亚的子公司资产。
description.en: State Grid acquired assets of its Australian subsidiary in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司推出的第三方支付平台，主要用于电费缴纳及提供金融服务。
description.en: A third-party payment platform launched by State Grid Corporation of China, primarily used for electricity bill payments and providing financial services.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司于2019年推出的线上服务平台，整合了多个原有服务入口。
description.en: An online service platform launched by State Grid Corporation of China in 2019, integrating several previous service portals.

description.zh-cn: 负责中国南方五省（区）电网投资、建设和经营管理的特大型中央企业，与国家电网公司同由国家电力公司拆分而来。
description.en: A super-large central state-owned enterprise responsible for the investment, construction, and operation management of the power grid in five southern provinces (regions) of China, formed from the breakup of the State Power Corporation alongside State Grid.

description.zh-cn: 张智刚担任国家电网有限公司的董事长。
description.en: Zhang Zhigang serves as the Chairman of State Grid Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 张文峰担任国家电网有限公司的总经理。
description.en: Zhang Wenfeng serves as the General Manager of State Grid Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司由其前身国家电力公司于2002年拆分重组而成。
description.en: State Grid Corporation of China was formed from the breakup and restructuring of its predecessor, the State Power Corporation of China, in 2002.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司是经中华人民共和国国务院同意进行国家授权投资的机构和国家控股公司。
description.en: State Grid Corporation of China is an institution authorized for state investment and a state-controlled holding company with the approval of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司由国务院国有资产监督管理委员会监管。
description.en: State Grid Corporation of China is supervised by the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council.

relationships.source: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会代表国务院履行出资人职责。
description.en: The State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council performs the duties of the investor on behalf of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司是一家特大型中央企业。
description.en: State Grid Corporation of China is a super-large central state-owned enterprise.

description.zh-cn: 2017年，国家电网公司由全民所有制企业整体改制为国有独资公司。
description.en: In 2017, State Grid Corporation was restructured from an enterprise owned by the whole people into a wholly state-owned company.

relationships.source: 国网新源控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 国网新源控股有限公司是国家电网有限公司的控股子公司。
description.en: Guowang Xinyuan Holdings Co., Ltd. is a holding subsidiary of State Grid Corporation of China.

relationships.target: 国网新源控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司持有国网新源控股有限公司70%的股份。
description.en: State Grid Corporation of China holds a 70% stake in Guowang Xinyuan Holdings Co., Ltd.

relationships.target: 国网新源控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国长江三峡集团持有国网新源控股有限公司30%的股份。
description.en: China Three Gorges Corporation holds a 30% stake in Guowang Xinyuan Holdings Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网公司收购了巴西电力巨头CPFL公司的54.64%股权，成为其控股股东。
description.en: State Grid Corporation acquired a 54.64% stake in the Brazilian power giant CPFL Energia, becoming its controlling shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网公司收购了智利输电公司Chilquinta Energia的全部股权。
description.en: State Grid Corporation acquired all shares of the Chilean transmission company Chilquinta Energia.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网有限公司向美国Sempra Energy公司收购其智利资产Chilquinta Energia。
description.en: State Grid Corporation of China acquired the Chilean asset Chilquinta Energia from the US company Sempra Energy.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网公司向意大利存贷款公司收购其旗下能源网公司35%股权。
description.en: State Grid Corporation acquired a 35% stake in the energy grid company subsidiary of Cassa Depositi e Prestiti.

description.zh-cn: 国家电网收购新加坡能源有限公司于澳洲的子公司资产。
description.en: State Grid acquired assets of Singapore Power's subsidiaries in Australia.

description.zh-cn: 电e宝是国家电网的第三方支付平台。
description.en: Dian e Bao is the third-party payment platform of State Grid.

description.zh-cn: 网上国网（原掌上电力）是国家电网于2019年推出的线上服务平台。
description.en: Online State Grid (formerly Zhangshang Dianli) is the online service platform launched by State Grid in 2019.
